Omnifacade Home Screen

GenAI Audit Summary

Upon clicking the notification bubble in the upper-right corner of the Omnifacade page, a window appears that provides "at a glance" summarizing every change made to order, payment and promising component's configurations in the past 60 days (past 7 days by default) along with the time the change was made and the user who made the change. This is only supported for English locale.  

Audit summary will be displayed only for the configurations below, from order, payment and promising components.

Order  Payment Promising
FULFILLMENT LOCATION CONFIGURATION PAYMENT RULES FULFILLMENT OPTIMIZATION
ORDER TYPES PAYMENT TYPES  
ORDER CONFIGURATION PAYMENT CONFIGURATION  
ORDER PARAMETERS PAYMENT GATEWAYS  
ORDER MONITORING RULE PAYMENT PARAMETERS  
RELEASE CONFIGURATION PAYMENT CAPTURE CONFIG  

 

Note: 

  • Users with Grant "omnifacade::configaudit::admin" can view the notification bubble button on the Omnifacade screen. 
  • For the audit summary view to work properly, ensure that the pay::eventConfig, ord::eventConfig, prm::eventConfig profile purpose is copied from the base profile to the user
